document_data.name: Smuggler's Run
document_data.mainbody: '''Smuggler's Run''' was a minor avenue of hard packed dirt and [[gravel]] in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: This alleyway ran from northeast to southwest, extending off of the [[Southyard]] and terminating at [[Sambril Lane]].
document_data.Notable Locations: * [[Gelfuril the Trader]], a shop that stood at the intersection of Sambril Lane and Smuggler's Run.
